description: With full, plush cushioning, the Classic Mountaineer Maximum Cushion Crew sock is just right for your long-distance and backpacking hikes. Its elasticized arch brace offers secure, lasting fit, and its flat knit toe seam helps with in-shoe comfort. Our thickest, warmest sock, this wool crew helps ensure that your feet stay comfortable, no matter how long the hike.
name: Smartwool Mountaineer Classic Edition Maximum Cushion Crew Socks - Mens
